text: Romani may refer to: * (Romani people mistakenly), correctly Roma people, an ethnic group of Northern Indian origin, living in Europe, the Americas and Asia. Romani is used for the language. ** Romani genocide, under Nazi rule * Romani language * Romanichal, Romani subgroup in the British Isles and ==Other uses== Romani is the plural of Romanus (Latin for Roman).
title: Romani
